title: Queen of the Night: Sexy Battle Between Sisters Hostesses
overview: No.2 Michiru (Claire Hasumi) of the cabaret club "Club Grace" was approaching the height of No. 1 with her natural good looks, bed tech, and the love of the store manager, Junya. One day, her sister, Rin, who had been isolated from a man's catch, ran away from home and rolled in.
